revised_title: Enhancing Agricultural Efficiency through Fractionation Processes
tldr: The article discusses the use of fractionation processes to improve agricultural yield and efficiency. It explains how mechanical fractionation can separate valuable crop components from useless or deleterious companions, enabling better utilization of resources. The author highlights various methods of fractionation, including field fractionation, dry fractionation, and fresh forage fractionation, and their potential benefits in terms of protein extraction, energy conservation, and waste reduction.
